name: A Chance at Love with Hikiyami Moriko DEMO
name_original: A Chance at Love with Hikiyami Moriko DEMO
description: Hikiyami Moriko dating simulator, a Visual Novel where you date a loser indie Vtuber as you unfold a secret adventure full of mysteries and death, or that's what it was supposed to be before I got sick days before delivering the project, now Is just a DEMO with some funny bits. Made in RPG maker MZ
